text: Ba bandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, nta cyaha kuri bo gituruka ku byo bariye (mbere yâ€™uko biziririzwa) mu gihe baba batinya Imana (birinda ibyo yabaziririje bamaze kubimenya), bakemera (ko biziririjwe), bakanakora ibikorwa byiza; hanyuma bakarushaho gutinya Allah ndetse bakanamwemera, maze bakarushaho gutinya Allah kurushaho bakanakora ibikorwa byiza. Kandi Allah akunda abakora ibikorwa byiza
